description.message: Useful extension of AdGuard ad blocking desktop program. Manages filtering right from the browser, hides annoying elements in two clicks.

adg_is_not_installed.message: AdGuard is not installed or configured incorrectly

increase_ab_block_quality.message: Increases the quality of ad blocking

reset_custom_rules.message: Reset all custom rules for this page

cert_expired.message: AdGuard could not verify this website's certificate because the root certificate has expired

cert_bypassed.message: AdGuard could not verify this website's certificate because the site was bypassed

cert_notfound.message: AdGuard could not verify this website's certificate because the certificate wasn't found

site_not_using_private_protection.message: The site isn't using a private connection. Someone might be able to see or change the information you send or get through the site.

not_filtering_https.message: By default, we don't filter HTTPS traffic for the payment system and bank websites. You can enable the filtering yourself: tap on the yellow "lock" on the left.
